author: Bijan Stephen
title: Go read this story on Airbnb’s plans to bounce back after the pandemic
description: Bloomberg Businessweek reported a story about Airbnb’s plans for recovering from the novel coronavirus pandemic. CEO Brian Chesky says he’s still ready to go public “when the storm clears.”
content:
The company is betting that people will want to hit the road when this is all over
Photo Illustration by Omar Marques/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
The travel industry is in shambles. Now that going places has become very ill-advised at best and … [+2013 chars]
